snippet: During the Chinese festival of Qingming, ancestors are honored with the burning of elaborate paper imitations of items - from cigarettes to iPads - that might ease their stay in the afterlife.
abstract: During the Chinese festival of Qingming, ancestors are honored with the burning of elaborate paper imitations of items - from cigarettes to iPads - that might ease their stay in the afterlife.

headline.main: For the Dearest Departed, Nothing Is Too Good
